name: floweret
description: A runtime signature type-checker using native JavaScript types.
author: Laurent Payot

scripts.build-all: npm run build && npm run build-tests
scripts.bundle: npm run build-ESM && cd benchmark && rollup -c && echo && cd bundles && stat -c '%n %s bytes' *.gz | sort -n -k 2 | column -t
scripts.bundle-CJS: npm run build && cd benchmark && rollup -c && echo && cd bundles && stat -c '%n %s bytes' *.gz | sort -n -k 2 | column -t
scripts.benchmark: npm run bundle && cd benchmark/bundles && node no-type-checking-benchmark.min.js && node floweret-benchmark.min.js && node runtypes.min.js && node flow-runtime-benchmark.min.js && echo
scripts.benchmark-unbundled: npm run build && cd benchmark && node no-type-checking.js && node floweret.js && node runtypes.js && node flow-runtime.js && echo
scripts.link: npm run test && cp package.json dist && cp *.md dist && cd dist && npm link
scripts.postversion: git push --tags && && cp package.json dist && cp *.md dist && cd dist && rm *.js.map && npm publish
